steps.name: The user is on the login page
The user clicks the register link

elements.name: User can register a new account with valid credentials

steps.name: The user provides a valid username
The user provides a valid password
The user submits credentials
The user should get a browser alert saying "Account created successfully"
The user should be redirected to the login page
The user is on the login page
The user clicks the register link
